documents.document:
June Short Courses Specials

This June, Accredited Online Training (AOT) is offering you the opportunity to claim a percentage of the cost of your short courses on your tax.

Enhance your career today with AOT or start a new career with nationally recognized qualifications and short courses such as:
• Food handling course
• Dreamweaver IT course
• Human resources management course

Read more about the special promotion by visiting http://www.aot.edu.au/ today.

Providing Effective Training and Assessment for Your Company

For most companies, training sessions and evaluations are regularly given to the employees or staff. If you are one of the employees in that company, you would want to receive quality training that would surely help you. However if you are the one providing the training, you would be faced with the challenge of how to make the training effective and interactive. To get the training education and qualifications you need to help you with the challenge, you can go online and search for training organization offering short courses.

Online, you will find numerous training organizations providing various online short courses. One of the registered training organizations you can find online is Accredited Online Training (AOT). You can be sure that the courses have met the standards for course excellence since the courses are nationally recognised. After you visit them online, you should enroll for the training and assessment course since you will be the one providing the training for the company.

By completing the TAA course, you will be able to choose the trainings properly and deliver them effectively. You will be able to prepare learning plans that are adjusted to meet the training needs of employees in the company. Through the TAA training, you will gain the skills to organise the training sessions and facilitate it.

Aside from knowing how to prepare and deliver training sessions, you will also gain knowledge on the various assessment methods and tools from the TAA course. You will learn how to deliver the assessment methods and use the tools to evaluate an employee’s competence. Using the information you obtain from the assessment tools, you can identify the training education needs and characteristics of the employees as a group and for each individual.

Aside from getting the training you need to effectively provide training for your company, you will also receive a nationally recognised certification once you complete the TAA course. So if you want to ensure that you have the skills and knowledge in providing effective training, make the investment of enrolling in a TAA course. To enroll for the course or to find out more about it, please visit http://www.aot.edu.au/certificate-iv/training-and-assessment-tae.html

The Benefits of Getting RSA Training

In the hospitality industry, one of the career paths that you can take is a career that involves the responsible service of alcohol. You could work on the bar as a bar attendant pouring drinks and handling bottles of wine to customers. If you are interested in working as a bar attendant, then you should consider getting RSA training to get the qualification and skills you need for the career.

For Australia and its many states, you will notice that most establishments in the hospitality industry have rules and regulations when it comes to the responsible service of alcohol. If you intend to become a bar attendant, you will need to know these regulations. You will also need to acquire the proper training to handle various situations in serving alcohol. By enrolling for RSA training with a registered training organisation such as Accredited Online Training (AOT), you will get to learn all of these plus more.

If you want to know how the RSA training will benefit you, here are some its benefits:

1. Gain knowledge of the State liquor legislations in Australia
Depending on the place on where you want to work in, you can enroll for either the Nationally Accredited or OLGR Approved RSA course at AOT. To know the state liquor legislations for Southern Australia, Western Australia, Northern Territory, and Australia Capital Territory, you can enroll for the Nationally Accredited RSA Course. For Queensland, you can enroll for the OLGR (Office of Liquor, Gaming and Racing) approved RSA course.

2. Obtain skills and certification for serving alcohol responsibly
By completing a responsible service of alcohol course with AOT, you will learn how to responsibly prepare and serve alcohol to customers. You will learn when to decline in serving alcohol. You will also learn how to aid customers who have been affected with alcohol. After you complete the course at AOT, you will receive a nationally accredited or OLGR approved RSA certificate.

3. Open new career paths in the hospitality industry
With the RSA certificate, you can start applying and work as a bar attendant in the hospitality industry.
You can also work as food and beverage attendant, host or hostess, cellar hand or room service staff.

So if you want to get the RSA training and certification for work in the hospitality industry, please visit http://www.aot.edu.au/hospitality.html

Various Certificate IV Training Courses You Can Learn Online

If you are a busy professional working for a company, there is an alternative option for getting training education aside from colleges and technical institutes. You can enroll for online courses with registered training organisations and get the training and qualification you need. If you are looking for such an organisation that offers certificate IV training course, Accredited Online Training (AOT) is one of them.

At AOT, you can enroll on any of their certificate IV training courses for:

1. Business
This certificate IV in business course will provide you with the training to obtain the necessary business skills for middle management positions. You will gain the knowledge to manage the financial, human, and physical resources in the workplace. This training education course is useful if you have supervisory or managerial responsibilities.

2. Business Administration
If you belong in the clerical administrative sector, the certificate IV business administration course will provide you with training for communication and administration skills. Aside from developing these skills, you will learn how to create supervise projects, financial reports, and other business documents.

3. Frontline Management
If your current career involves leadership and project management, this course will provide you with the essential skills to become an effective team leader. The certificate IV training course will also help learn how to achieve effective strategic planning so that you can receive greater profit.

4. Small Business Management
This course can guide you on how to operate a small business effectively. You will learn various entrepreneurial skills such as promoting products and services, developing business plans, and managing financial accounts.

5. Training and Assessment
If you have a team, you can get the knowledge and skills to provide effective training and evaluation for your team members through this course. You will also gain the skills on how to recruit, evaluate, and select people for your organization or business.

To get more details about the courses or to enroll for any of the certificate IV training courses, please visit http://www.aot.edu.au/certificate-iv.html

Take the RSA Course Today

Looking for a new career? Get the training and qualification you need to start a career in the hospitality industry with a Responsible Service of Alcohol course from Accredited Online Training (AOT).

Work as a bar attendant, host or hostess, or as part of a hotel room service staff in Australia by completing the:

• Nationally accredited RSA course,
• OLGR approved RSA course for Queensland

Enroll now at http://www.aot.edu.au/

Get Training and Assessment Today

Interested in becoming a skilled trainer? Train to become an expert trainer in any industry or subject matter you want with a training and assessment course at Accredited Online Training (AOT).

Completing the TAA course will give you a nationally recognized certificate IV certification for employment opportunities like:

• Public and private VET trainer,
• On-the-job performance evaluator,
• Professional Human Resource Development officer.

Enroll in a TAA course today at http://www.aot.edu.au/

Practical Human Resources Management Course

AOT offers Human Resources management specifically designed for individuals who want to develop practical human resources skills as office administrators, and human resource personnel.

• Perform HR roles
• Efficiently perform the Recruitment processes
• Develop effective workplace relationships

Enroll now! Pay upfront or in monthly installment.
Visit http://www.aot.edu.au/diploma/human-resources.html

Gear Up Your IT Career

Want to take your IT career to the next level?

AOT has the solution to your needs.

Information technology jobs are in demand nowadays. AOT offers short courses on computer software and hardware, and getting geared with these latest short courses AOT offers makes sure you will not be left behind. So, enroll now! Get hired and get paid high!

For further inquiries on AOT’s short courses, just visit their website at http://www.aot.edu.au/

Responsible Service of Alcohol Course

Accredited Online Training offers Responsible Service of Alcohol Course. It is a mandatory course for people who will work in any licensed premises who want to sell and serve alcohol.

AOT created the most updated, very informative and entertaining RSA course for students online. It will allow them to achieve the certificate they need to work in the hospitality industry.

For more details log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/

Frontline Management Course at AOT

Accredited Online Training’s frontline management course will provide important and effective skills in supervisory, delegating, team building, and conflict resolution.

The course is designed for people who need to go up to supervisory level and need to enhance their skills to become effective team leaders. Or people who are already in that level but just want to become more effective.

All AOT short courses are given online!

So for more details log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/

How Frontline Management Courses Can Help You Become a Leade

In various companies, there are various management positions that you can apply for. You could apply for an accounting management, frontline management, or a financial management position. Depending on your qualifications, skills and preferences, you could apply for any of these positions. However If you are more interested in managing people and would like a career as a team leader, then the frontline management position would surely suit you.

Before you can apply for a frontline management position in a company, you will need to first get an idea on what your roles will be and obtain the necessary certification to qualify you for the position. With online courses being popular nowadays, you can also learn and get the frontline management certification you need by enrolling in an online course. You can find a lot of these online courses being provided by training education organisations.

To get started with your training, you can enroll at Accredited Online Training (AOT), a registered training organisation based in Australia, and enroll for their certificate IV frontline management course. Through the training education course, you will learn how to effectively lead people, contribute to the benefit of the business, reach goals, and achieve more revenue for greater profit.

To help you develop your leadership skills, the frontline management course will provide you with knowledge on how to show leadership in the workplace. You will learn various methods on how to improve the performance effectiveness of your team. Through the training education course, you will also learn how to monitor the workplace and make sure that the environment in it is safe for your team.

You will learn how to implement an operation plan and continuous improvement activities through the certificate IV training course. You will be able to attain more profit by learning how to promote the products and services of your business. With your team effectively working, you will be able to reach your goals faster and contribute positively to the business.

Aside from gaining the knowledge and skills to become an effective leader, you will also gain the certificate IV qualification in frontline management. If you already have supervisory skills, the certification can provide you with a formal recognition for your training in becoming an effective leader.

To get more details about the course now or to get the training education you need to become an effective leader, please visit http://www.aot.edu.au/certificate-iv/frontline-management.html

How to Improve Your Training and Assessment Skills

In a company, there is always room for growth that is why employees in most companies are provided with training and assessment activities. As the training manager of a company, you will find training to be a very important tool in developing the human resources in the company. Through effective training education, you will be able to improve the performance of employees with the added knowledge and skills that they learned.

To help you gain the knowledge and skills to effectively organise in-house training in the company workplace as a training manager, you can enroll for a training and assessment course. Although you can choose to take the course at workshops or schools, getting the course online provides you with various benefits. You can study anywhere with an online TAA course. You can also schedule your study time for the course to fit into your lifestyle.

If you are working in Australia, you can enroll for the TAA course at the registered training organisation, Accredited Online Training (AOT). At AOT, you are offered with the certificate IV TAA course, which will provide you with the training and certification to become a certified trainer in various industries.

Through the TAA course, you will learn how to train employees individually or in groups. You will be provided with the knowledge to organise group based training education activities in the company. You will also learn how to develop various assessment tools to provide you with the information to make the training more effective.

If you are already working in a company, a TAA certification will greatly improve your qualifications as a trainer. Aside from qualifying as a trainer, you also gain the qualification as a lecturer, on the job assessor, and human resource professional development officer by completing the TAA course.

So if you want to improve your training skills and learn the various assessment tools, please visit http://www.aot.edu.au/certificate-iv/training-and-assessment-tae.html

Accredited Online Training Offers Short Courses

November 18, 2010 – Cairns, Queensland, Australia – Queensland’s top online registered training organization – Accredited Online Training – offers short courses that can improve employment opportunities.

Accredited Online Training (AOT) offers short courses that will surely improve employment opportunities:

Business Short Courses – business management courses , office administration, personal assistant skills, introduction to time management, small business basic, small business start up, time management short courses, create and use spreadsheets, use business technology, and organize meetings and conferences.

Computing short courses – beginners word and excel 2007, advance word and excel 2007, learning office 2007 course, learning vista, advance word 2007, Microsoft access 2007, advance excel 2007, Microsoft PowerPoint 2007, understanding the internet, and understanding the Pc.

Customer Service Courses – customer service solutions, implementation of customer services strategies.

Finance Short Courses – Financial services, financial management short courses, maintains finances and accounts, financial records and receipts, and process payroll and accounts clerical.

Frontline Management Short courses – Team leader and team leader advance short course.

Hospitality short courses – workplace hygiene, RSA responsible service of alcohol, RSA responsible service of alcohol OLGR, food and beverage short course, RSG responsible service of gambling, RSA & RSG, and RSA QLD bridging short courses OLGR.

Human Resources – human resource officer short course.

Information Technology short courses – A+ 2009 certification, communication skills for IT Specialists, SQL server 2005 implementing a database and writing queries, SQL 2008 designing, optimizing, and maintaining a database course and also implementation & maintenance, security essentials for computer users, wireless network administration and security, windows server 2008 active directory configuration and administrator, and SharePoint server 2007.

And a lot more short courses that you can choose from. Those courses are nationally recognized that will surely improve employment opportunities.

So for a complete listing of all short courses offered, just log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/

Get Special Christmas Value for Certificate IV training at A

November 18, 2010 – Cairns, Queensland, Australia – The best online training site – Accredited Online Training – is now giving out a special Christmas value for certificate IV training.

Accredited Online Training is celebrating Christmas early this November with a huge savings on Certificate IV, Dual Certificate IV, Diploma and Double Diploma qualifications. They are even offering a Christmas Gift to students who enroll and pay in full for any of the qualifications during the month of November

Students who paid in full for a Certificate IV or Dual Certificate IV qualification will receive a pre-paid Visa gift card worth $300.

For certificate IV training, instead of paying $2,880, pay only $2,592. Courses under Certificate IV Training include Human Resources, Frontline Management, Business, Project Management course, Business Administration, and Small Business Management courses .

Then for the dual certificate IV training instead of $3,640, pay only $3,299. The dual courses are Human Resources and Frontline Management , Frontline Management and Business, and Business and Human Resources Management.

Aside from the above, they also have special Christmas value for diploma or double diploma courses.

If students pay in full for a Diploma or Double Diploma qualification, they will receive a pre-paid Visa gift card worth $500.

For a diploma, instead of paying $3,800, students pay only $2,999 for human resources, management, business, project management course, and business administration. And for the double diploma students paying $4,920 before now only pay $3,799. With double courses of business and business management, business administration and management, business and human resources and business administration.

Accredited Online Training brings students a gift that they will surely treasure. Getting more savings for a Certificate IV training and dual certificate IV, plus a diploma and double diploma!

So for more details about AOT special Christmas value, log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/

RSA Short Courses Offered by Accredited Online Training

November 18, 2010 – Cairns, Queensland, Australia – the best online school in Australia – Accredited Online Training – offered short courses for RSA .

Accredited Online Training now offers Responsible Service of Alcohol short courses for students with flexible and affordable payments options.

The Responsible Service of Alcohol or RSA is OLGR approved and is valid in Queensland. It is a mandatory course if planning to work in any of the thousands of licensed premises in Queensland where alcohol is sold and served.

In order to provide a duty to care for patrons it is very important to be updated with the current state laws. And must have the OLGR approved RSA certificate.

AOT has created the most up to date visual, highly informative and entertaining RSA courses available. Those RSA courses are QLD recognized and delivered online in QLD that allows students to achieve their certificate.

For the RSA courses, students will have a greater understanding on alcohol and the effects it has on health and society. They will know the Australian and State liquor legislations and penalties.
They will also know how to identify customers to whom service should be refused, how to responsively prepare and serve alcohol, help customers to drink within the right limits, and assist drunken customers.

The possible careers for students who finished the Responsible Service of Alcohol courses are:
food and beverage attendant, bar attendant, bottle shop attendant, host/hostess, cocktail bar attendant, Sommelier (wine Steward), room service staff, glass collectors, cellar hands, licensee, and nominee.

For students who take RSA, it will only take 6hrs for the total nominal hours, with a maximum two months access to online course. And the requirements are that students should have enough literacy and numeracy skills to complete the course and access to internet connection and computer.

So for more details about RSA courses, log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/

Human Resources Management Short Course

Human Resources Management Short Course is offered by Accredited Online Training. It consists of 4 units of study and is accredited for a Certificate IV in Human Resources. If you study the complete 6 units then you are qualified for a complete full qualification.

The Certificate IV in Human Resources is recognized as an entry level certification for Human Resources Management officer.

For more details log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/

AOT offers Short Courses

Accredited Online Training offers short courses like:

Frontline management
Human resources management
Responsible Service of Alcohol
Project management course
Small business management course

And a lot more that can give you certificates that you need to advance in your careers. AOT online short courses gives you the option to learn at your free time.

For more information regarding short courses log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/

Training Education at Accredited Online Training

Accredited Online Training offers many courses that will help enhance careers. They specialize in creating and providing vital online training courses and short courses for corporate clients and individuals who want to enhance their learning and skills.

They use the latest technology and create interactive online learning solutions and combine them with unique formats and tools. Because AOT’s mission is to provide students with the best learning solutions that combine theory, experience, and action plans allowing students to learn by actually doing them. They provide practice and application of new skills to realistic problems, so that students will be able to really understand and learn.

AOT’s courses offered are:

Education courses – certificate IV in training and assessment

Business courses – Certificate II and IV in business, Certificate IV in Small business management.

Administration courses – certificate III and IV in business administration, diploma in business administration.

Management courses – certificate IV in business (frontline management),certificate IV in human resources and small business management, diploma in project management course and management.

Computing courses – learning vista, Microsoft word, excel, access, and PowerPoint 2007.

Information technology courses – communication skills for IT specialists, HTML fundamentals, security essentials for computer users, wireless network administration and security.

Finance courses – certificate III in financial services (accounts clerical)

Hospitality courses – responsible service of alcohol, responsible gambling services, and workplace hygiene procedures.

Accredited Online Training also offers OH&S short courses, start your own business short courses, training and assessment short courses, and web development courses. They also provide traineeship courses that are funded by the Government. So for those employees who want to improve their job performance and increase their salary, they can choose what courses they can take at AOT. And they do not have to worry about their salary because it will not be affected in any ways.

For more details log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/

Hot Deal Diploma in Business Courses This Holiday Season

Taking short courses is a good preparation for doubling your employment opportunities. Starting this November, Accredited Online Training (AOT) is celebrating the start of the festive season with huge savings on their Certificate IV qualifications.
In addition, AOT is offering a Christmas Gift for students who enroll and pay in full for any of the training education courses starting this November.
If you want to earn a diploma in business, choose among the following short courses:

Human Resources Training

Almost all businesses require a human resource department to supervise staff hiring and termination, salaries and the general well-being of employees. With a Diploma in Human Resources you could take on the role of a human resources officer.
While taking the human resources training, you will be able to learn skills that are common across all HR roles. The course focuses on developing presentation skills, coordinating general HR services, and recruitment processes.

Project Management Course

The Certificate IV in Project Management reflects the cross-industry application of the work functions normally undertaken by a project team, spanning all phases of a project from concept through to close-out. While taking the project management course, you will gain valuable skills, including setting timelines and targets, project costing, budget management, quality control, communicating with key stakeholders as well as recruiting and leading personnel to work on the project.
Furthermore, the project management course will let you achieve the project management principles and processes as well as the application of tools, techniques and methods crucial to a successful project.
Both the human resources training and the project management course will take you 448 hours and 300 hours, respectively to accomplish and is delivered via distant learning process. From the original price of $2,880, bothnow cost only $2,592 plus a $300 gift card as part of the Christmas short courses offering of AOT.
For inquiries, call 1300-72-6634 or log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/hot-deals.html

Get RSA Certification Online

Know the essentials of working with top hotels, clubs and over 10,000 licensed alcohol stores and gambling premises across Australia.

Learn how to comply with the legal responsibilities associated with the service of alcohol and gambling by getting an RSA certification or RSG certificate.

Whether you are seeking part-time or full time employment, Responsible Service of Alcohol (RSA) and Responsible Service of Gambling (RSG) certification is a mandatory training course that you must complete before commencing your career in the liquor and gaming industry.

Accredited Online Training (AOT) RSA + RSG online short courses are based on National Competency Standard and is fully approved by Office of Liquor and Gaming Regulation (OLGR).

The online RSA + RSG Certification training education courses are accredited by VETAB and includes 1 unit of RSA (SITHFAB009A) and 1 unit of RSG (SITHGAM006A). The course covers topics to train you on legalities with patron contact and compliance of current local Australian laws regarding liquor and gambling services.

After successfully completing the RSA or the RSG certification course, you will be able to:

• Prepare and serve alcohol responsibly.
• Recognize the level of intoxication of customers.
• Identify customers and minors to whom service should be refused.
• Comply with Australian and State liquor legislations and penalties.
• Provide responsible gambling services.
• Educate gambling patrons at risk.

Taking the Responsible Service of Alcohol and the RSG Certification courses can:

• Make you more employable in hospitality industry.
• Make your more knowledgeable about liquor and gambling services.
• Expand your career possibilities - Alcohol and gaming attendant (host/hostess), Hotel and Club Assistant Manager, Hotel and Club Duty Manager, etc.

AOT even has a special offer to save you money on an RSA and RSG combined package to get both certificates in one go.

Be prepared to grab the right opportunity at the right time. Call AOT at 1300-72-6634 or click on http://www.aot.edu.au/

Enroll for Diploma in Business at AOT this Yuletide Season

Thinking of what to put on your Christmas wish list? Why not include tuition fee so you can enroll in any of the diploma in business short courses at Accredited Online Training (AOT)?
AOT offers huge discount this Christmas season which provides great opportunity to study for less while doubling the chance of getting hired. Since business related short courses are in demand nowadays, enrolling in any of those this coming holiday season will equip you with double qualifications.
At AOT, they offer double Diploma for Business and Business Administration short courses that include:

Diploma in Business (BSB50207)

The Diploma of Business training and assessment is ideal for team leaders and those who are starting a career in management. This particular diploma in business will provide you with a broad understanding of contemporary business practices, which can be used within a variety of entry level positions in both public and private sectors.

Diploma Business Administration (BSB50407)

The Diploma Business Administration course is designed to provide you with a planning and organisational perspective of administration which builds upon your existing computer skills using complex technical features.

Plus, when you complete the full Diploma in Business course online with Accredited Online Training (AOT) and you can also gain a second diploma qualification in Business Administration.

Benefits in taking any of the Double Diploma short courses training education includes:

• Reduced number of units of study.
• Tuition fee savings.
• Savings in time and effort.
• Making you more employable or promotable.
• Gaining multiple skills and knowledge over multiple disciplines.

So what are you waiting for? Enroll now and start doubling your job opportunities!
For inquiries, call AOT at 1300-72-6634 or log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/diploma/ to find out more about the great learning benefits for this Christmas.

Up Skill with AOT FREE Traineeship!

Do you want to secure your current job position? If so, then AOT’s traineeship programs could help you secure and boost your career!

The employment landscape is changing. Securing your job nowadays means updating your skills and knowledge with new industry solutions, practices and trends. And there could be no better way to enhance your career than continuous online training education.

And to make it more interesting, AOT, one of Australia’s premiere online training organizations, offers FREE government funded traineeship programs. Their FREE industry training education will provide you with the right skills to not only effectively do your job, but potentially boost your salary by $100 every year!

Plus, you are not required to make any financial contributions towards the cost of the traineeship program. You can continue to work with no changes in your salary or hours of work. AOT’s online traineeship allows you to learn at a time and pace that suits your lifestyle and commitments.

You can choose a qualification from the extensive range of short courses available at AOT. These qualifications include:
• Certificate IV in Business
• Certificate IV I in Business Administration
• Certificate IV in Frontline Management
• Certificate IV in Small Business Management
• Certificate IV in Training and Assessment (TAA )
• Certificate IV and Diploma in Project Management
• Diploma in Business

Upon completion of the traineeship you will be able to:

• Increase your chances of gaining a promotion
• Enhance your future career prospects
• Improve existing and new skills
AOT FREE traineeship program is available for permanent employees either part time or full time. It is also applicable for any working age from 18 to 65 years of age!
So what are you waiting for? Opportunities like this do not come along everyday so get started today! Call 1300 72 66 34 or log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/traineeships.html

Becoming a Bartender in Australia

Bartending is an exciting career. It is one of the best ways to have fun, travel and earn a living in Australia. Besides, there is no better way to make friends and meet the locals than to serve them with their favorite beverages and cocktails.

However, Aussies take their alcohol seriously. You have to hold a certification in RSA to tend a bar in any state of the country.

RSA or Responsible Service of Alcohol is a mandatory course to anyone who wishes to work in one of the thousands of premises in Australia where alcohol is sold and served. This is a requirement by the 2008 liquor legislations introduced in all states of Australia.

As such, there are many online training organizations in Australia which offers RSA courses and RSA training. And the most recognized and acclaimed training education institution is Accredited Online Training (AOT).

AOT is renowned for providing outstanding RSA courses that integrate theory, experience and action planning. Of which allowing you to “learn by doing” through practice and application of new skills and knowledge to realistic workplace challenges.

Meanwhile, AOT has also created the most up-to-date visual, highly entertaining and innovative RSA training and RSA course in the net. With AOT RSA training , you will be able to:

? Understand alcohol and its effects on health and society
? Gain knowledge of state liquor legislations and penalties in Australia
? Identify whom service should be refused
? Assist patrons to drink within appropriate limits as well as assist alcohol affected customers

At the end of your RSA training, you will be required to take multiple choice assessments about:

? Your understanding of the training education
? Your ability to apply these knowledge to a range of circumstances that may occur in a work environment
So what are you waiting for? Do not let this opportunity to slip by.
Call 1300 72 66 34 or log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/responsible-service-of-alcohol.html

Get a Food Handling Certificate at AOT



Workplace or Personal hygiene practices and proper food handling is necessary to all establishments operating at all levels within the service industries such as kitchen hands, cooks, chefs, catering staff, food and beverage attendants in business catering operations or retail food outlets.

Thus, personnel who work in these industries are required to accomplish a food handling certificate.
The food handling certificate is a fundamental course required if you wish to work in the Australian hospitality industry. The ability to follow workplace hygiene procedure is stringently regulated within the hospitality and associated industry. Thus it is highly recommended for those who want to work in food establishments to have a food handling certificate.

Training education in food handling will give you the skills and knowledge required to apply appropriate workplace hygiene practices within a range of service industry operations. They will gain the:

- Ability to follow proper workplace hygiene procedures
- Predetermined procedures, identify and control simple hazards
- Apply hygiene measures to ensure the non-contamination of food that might put customers, colleagues and self at a health risk.

And one of the most trusted online training organizations AOT offers food handling certificate which is delivered 100% online. Training education starts as soon as you sign up and log into your account. You can start the course anytime you want and finish it at any pace that suits your lifestyle.

Upon successful; completion of this training education, you will receive a Statement of Attainment for Follow workplace hygiene procedures as a part of the Advanced Diploma of Tourism Management.

Aside from the food handling certificate, AOT also offers other hospitality short courses such as RSA training, certificate in Responsible Service of Gambling, RSA course (Queensland) and food and beverage certificate as well as RSA Queensland bridging short course.

To know more about how to accomplish a food handling certificate, call 1300 72 66 34 or log on to http://www.aot.edu.au/follow-workplace-hygiene-procedures.html
